title: 57: Episode #57: This Episode is Outdated
itunes:title: Episode #57: This Episode is Outdated
description:
• Lots of empty promises
  • Too many bad jokes
  • Ben and Jamie’s Subway Challenge
  • Embarrassingly late name introductions
  • A 4-week old birthday wish
  • Character Discussion: Aunt Petunia
  • Is Aunt Petunia a Squib?
  • Where’s the love for Lily and Harry?
  • Where did Petunia get all this info about the magical world?
  • What is Dudley afraid of?
  • What would Harry’s boggart be?
